Role: Striker. You are a warrior who focuses divine power through a dark vice. You wield this vice as a weapon, using it to slay any who oppose you.

Power Source: Divine.

Key Abilities: Strength, Charisma

Armor Proficiencies: Cloth, leather, hide, chainmail, scale, plate; heavy shields, light shields.

Weapon Proficiencies: Simple melee, military melee, simple ranged, military ranged.

Implement: Holy symbol

Bonus to Defense: +1 Fortitude, +1 Reflex, +1 Will.

Hit Points at 1st Level : 15+ Constitution Score.

Hit Points per Level Gained : 6

Healing Surges per Day : 10+ Constitution Modifier.

Trained Skills : From the class skills list below, choose 4 trained skills at 1st level.

Class Skills : Arcana (Int), Athletics (Str), Bluff (Cha), Endurance (Con), History (Int), Intimidate (Cha), Religion (Int), Thievery (Dex).

Class features: Dark Menace, Dread Smite, Shroud of Shadow, Spirit of Vice, Vengeance Strike, Vice At-Will Power.

 

PALADIN (BLACKGUARD) CLASS FEATURES

Level 1:

Dark Menace

Whenever you make a weapon attack against an enemy granting combat advantage to you, that enemy takes extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Dread Smite

You gain the dread smite power.

Dread Smite;

Shroud Of Shadow

You gain the shroud of shadow power.

Shroud of Shadow;

Spirit Of Vice

You gain a benefit associated with your vice.

Spirit of Vice (Domination); Spirit of Vice (Fury);

Vengeance Strike

You gain the vengeance strike power.

Vengeance Strike;

Vice At-Will Power

You gain an at-will attack power associated with your vice.

Vice At-Will Power (Domination); Dominator's Strike; Vice At-Will Power (Fury); Ferocious Strike;

Level 2:

Vice's Reward

You gain the vice's reward power.

Vice's Reward;

Level 3:

Level 3 Extra Dread Smite

You gain one more use of dread smite per encounter, but you can use it only once per turn.

Level 4:

Servant Of Vice

You gain the servant of vice power.

Servant of Vice;

Level 5:

Level 5 Blackguard Daily Power

You gain a new paladin daily attack power of your level or lower.

Dark Majesty; Frenzying Smite;

Level 6:

Level 6 Blackguard Utility Power

You gain a new paladin utility power of your level or lower.

Aspect of Domination; Aspect of Ferocity;

Level 7:

Improved Shroud Of Shadow

Your shroud of shadow power gains an additional effect associated with your vice.

Improved Shroud of Shadow (Domination);

Level 9:

Improved Shroud of Shadow (Fury);

Level 9 Blackguard Daily Power

You gain a new paladin daily attack power of your level or lower.

Death Angel; Spirit Harrow;

Level 10:

Level 10 Blackguard Utility Power

You gain a new paladin utility power of your level or lower.

Deathly Aura; Turn of the Dark Tide;

Level 13:

Level 13 Extra Dread Smite

You gain one more use of dread smite per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn.

Level 15:

Level 15 Blackguard Daily Power

You gain a new paladin daily attack power of your level or lower.

Avatar of Slaughter; Avatar of Subjugation;

Level 16:

Level 16 Blackguard Utility Power

You gain a new paladin utility power of your level or lower.

Pragmatic Sacrifice; Shadow Healing;

Level 17:

Dauntless Presence

When an ally spends a healing surge while adjacent to you, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Level 19:

Level 19 Blackguard Daily Power

You can gain a new paladin daily attack power of your level or lower. If you do so, this new power must replace one of the daily attack powers you already have from your class (usually your lowest-level daily attack power).

Plundering Smite; Ruinous Smite;

Level 22:

Level 22 Vice Utility Power

You gain a utility power associated with your vice.

Level 22 Vice Utility Power (Domination); Dark Grace; Level 22 Vice Utility Power (Fury); Rampaging Bloodlust;

Level 23:

Shadow Leap

After you use shroud of shadow, you can take a free action to teleport up to 5 squares.

Level 25:

Level 25 Blackguard Daily Power

You can gain a new paladin daily attack power of your level or lower. If you do so, this new power must replace one of the daily attack powers you already have from your class (usually your lowest-level daily attack power).

Ravenous Shadows; Venomous Infection;

Level 27:

Shadow Infusion

You gain resist 20 necrotic and resist 20 cold.

Level 29:

Avatar Of Vice

You can gain the avatar of vice power. If you do so, this new power must replace one of the daily attack powers you already have from your class (usually your lowest-level daily attack power).

Avatar of Vice;

Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 33.
